name: The Walls are Lava
description:
"The Walls are Lava" is a game similar to "Don't touch the spikes" built using Love2D!

● Controls:
[Right Click] 
[Left Click]
[Touch Display]
They all do the same, pick your poison.

● Credits:
Special Thanks to:
Love2D for the game Framework.
LÖVE Web Builder for porting this game to web.

(This game is a practice/learning project!)
